description: This file implements the CCSP CWMP ACS connection object, specifically providing the function to retrieve HTTP credentials used for authentication in the CcspCwmpAcscoHttpGetCredential method.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpAcscoHttpGetCredential(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PUCHAR pHostName,USHORT HostPort,PUCHAR pUriPath,PUCHAR * ppUserName,PUCHAR * ppPassword)
methods.description: Retrieves HTTP authentication credentials (username and password) for the ACS connection, either from the session's processor object or from the object's stored username and password.

ctags.name: CcspCwmpAcscoHttpGetCredential
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PUCHAR pHostName,USHORT HostPort,PUCHAR pUriPath,PUCHAR * ppUserName,PUCHAR * ppPassword)
